```{r}
# libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(astsa)
library(quantmod)
```

1. Data Exploration and Visualization

```{r}
# Meta (Facebook)
getSymbols("META", from = "2012-05-18", to = "2023-04-03", src = 'yahoo')
chartSeries(META, theme = "white", TA = NULL, subset = "2021-01::2022-12")
# Apple
getSymbols("AAPL", from = "2012-05-18", to = "2023-04-03", src = 'yahoo')
chartSeries(AAPL, theme = "white", TA = NULL, subset = "2021-01::2022-12")
# Amazon
getSymbols("AMZN", from = "2012-05-18", to = "2023-04-03", src = 'yahoo')
chartSeries(AMZN, theme = "white", TA = NULL, subset = "2021-01::2022-12")
# Netflix
getSymbols("NFLX", from = "2012-05-18", to = "2023-04-03", src = 'yahoo')
chartSeries(NFLX, theme = "white", TA = NULL, subset = "2021-01::2022-12")
# Google (Alphabet Inc.)
getSymbols("GOOG", from = "2012-05-18", to = "2023-04-03", src = 'yahoo')
chartSeries(GOOG, theme = "white", TA = NULL, subset = "2021-01::2022-12")
```
